org.trianacode.gui.builder

Class Scroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.builder.Scroller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

    public class Scroller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener
    This implements a scroller which works on floating point values
